content:
Hi,
I'm currently trying to build an IG for a project but am slightly overwhelmed by the amount of non-FHIR and non-Documentation files that seem to be required to run the publisher (e.g. the content of the "pages" folder...). Is there an official template \ open-sourced modifiable example for Implementation Guides? I'm looking for a "your project name goes here, your resources there" kind of thing.
(Sorry if that has already been answered, but i wasn't able to find anything on Zulip or on the IG Publisher HL7 wiki page.)
(This exists but the links are broken...)
@Noemi Deppenwiese Ask this question again next Tuesday. A template now exists, but has no documentation. That should be addressed over the next few days.
Good to know that this is being worked on... I'll be back! :slight_smile:
